column5: I went fishing yesterday and saw a guy fly fishing. He ended up catching 2 decent size bass. He was using a yellow bug popper lure. I dont know anything about fly fishing or poppers, but can a popper be used with a spinner rod/ reel combo? If so, how would it be rigged? It seems like a pretty effective lure. I was using my mepps black fury 3 and was able to hook a small large mouth, but their werent many bites at all.  Thanks
I'd recommend you get a few of the smaller Hula Poppers or similar spinning sized floating plugs , would essentially be the same thing but with enough weight to cast on your spinning rig.
I agree 100% on that one.  not like that maters but still, I do...
